com.yantra.ycm.japi.ue

Interface YCMGetItemAssociationsUE


  • public interface YCMGetItemAssociationsUE

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document getItemAssociations(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      The YCMGetItemAssociationsUE user exit interface contains user exit method for getItemAssociations API.

    • Method Detail

      • getItemAssociations

        org.w3c.dom.Document getItemAssociations(YFSEnvironment env,
                                         org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                  throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException

        The YCMGetItemAssociationsUE user exit interface contains user exit method for getItemAssociations API. It provides you with an option of externalizing the logic to get Item Associations.

        To code custom user exits, implement the method in this interface. The system calls the methods in your class. If this method gives any exception, the current transaction is rolled back.

        If the User Exit is used to determine superseded items, the user exit must set AssociationType attribute to value "Substitutions". When the user exit is being called via findInventory API, the user exit should also set AssociatedQuantity="1" for supersession to be considered. The user exit must provide the ItemId, UOM, and Product Class for the requested associated item. For further explaination regarding to other association types please refer to findInventory API javadocs.


        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD

        Pre-conditions: This user exit is called unconditionally.

        Post-conditions: The output XML containing Item Associations for the given input criteria.


        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inXML - Required, containing Item Association select criteria. For more information, see the associated input xml files.


        Returns:
        An XML document containing Item Associations for the given input criteria. For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.


        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException - This exception is thrown whenever system errors that the application cannot handle are encountered. The transaction is aborted and changes are rolled back.
